CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( litify_pm__lit_Damage__c ), '', 'Damage, ') & IF( ISBLANK( litify_pm__lit_Expense__c ), '', 'Expense, ') & IF( ISBLANK( litify_pm__lit_Insurance__c ), '', 'Insurance, ') & IF( ISBLANK( litify_pm__lit_Intake__c ), '', 'Intake, ') & IF( ISBLANK( litify_pm__lit_Matter__c ), '', 'Matter, ') & IF( ISBLANK( litify_pm__lit_Negotiation__c ), '', 'Negotiation, ') & IF( ISBLANK( litify_pm__lit_Account__c ), '', 'Party, ') & IF( ISBLANK( litify_pm__lit_Referral__c ), '', 'Referral, ') & IF( ISBLANK( litify_pm__lit_Request__c ), '', 'Request, ') & IF( ISBLANK( litify_pm__lit_Resolution__c ), '', 'Resolution, ') & IF( ISBLANK( litify_pm__lit_Role__c ), '', 'Role, ') & IF( ISBLANK( litify_pm__lit_Time_Entry__c ), '', 'Time Entry, ')
CustomField.label: Related To
